sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>These small, squat devices provide both light and heat for the surrounding area. They are also quite durable and reliable, and are commonly found in larger travel kits and survival packs. Characters can also plug other electronic devices into a fusion lantern to power them, such as datapads, glow rods, and small scanning devices.   Models Include: SoroSuub Powermax Fusion Lantern.</description> <encumbrance>2</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Fusion Lantern</name> <number>GEAR0001092</number> <price>150</price> <range/> <rarity>2</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 21:42:47</sys_created_on> <sys_id>525280382f94a450e0f497eef699b690</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 21:42:47</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
